meta.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 51
meta.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the third week of December 2021

pageProps.content:
• Dr. Leonid Rogozov: The Soviet surgeon who removed his own appendix while stranded in Antarctica, 1961
  • Kintsugi, also known as kintsukuroi, is the Japanese art of repairing broken pottery by mending the areas of breakage with lacquer dusted or mixed with powdered gold, silver, or platinum; the method is similar to the maki-e technique.
  • Found how to be a game changer article series.
  • Dan Luu's thoughts on writing.
  • Julia Evans created a tool to play around with DNS.
  • System design: How to build large-scale end-to-end encrypted group video calls
